professional.title: Wisdom Marine Group
professional.content:
- Operate 7-9 vessels at one time, covering problem-solving, budget management, coordination with other departments andoyage optimization.
- In charge of day-to-day operation with hire/laytime calculation for Voyage Charter, Time Charter Trip and Time Charter Period.
- Claim cases handling and Charter Party clauses reviewing prior to fixtures.
- Liaise with Agency and Bunker Trader for VC arrangement.

professional.title: Max-Bridge Co., Ltd
professional.content:
- Engaged in daily liaison with Owners and Charterers.
- Ensure that fixtures are concluded according to charter party clauses and shipping terms/practices.
- Handled disputes and prepared charter parties.

professional.title: Interasia Lines, Limited
professional.content:
- Managed equipment (containers) inventory in Taiwan, Vietnam and Cambodia wide.
- Handled stock monitoring and forecasting, depot performance, data quality, cost control and execution of container distribution.
- Built models to improve workflow by Oracle.

professional.title: Evergreen Marine Corporation
professional.content:
- Assisted deck officers and handled their day-to-day operations.
- Developed skills, knowledges and competence of being deck officer.

items.title: Vessel Daily Performance Model
items.content: Build a model to web-crawl data of whole fleet from routing company’s website to preliminarily check speed performance and calculate time loss/bunker consumption, if any.

items.title: WPG Dadatong Social Network Analysis
items.content: WPG Dadatong Social Network Analysis use Python, SQL and Gephi for full stack development. It's purpose is providing constructive suggestions on how to improve company’s website.
